extendedInfo.description: This app is a bowling score tracker/keeper that tracks bowling scores to the pin. This app supports multiple bowlers and leagues, and will track up to a 20 game series on a date for a specific league and bowler.(Who bowls the same league twice in one night?) Tracks Ball thrown for each throw, Strike and Spare Balls and the mark thrown and feet position for each ball thrown. Once scores are entered you have the option to view statistics for: Game Scores between dates for a bowler Series Scores on certain dates for a bowler Strikes/Spares/Open frame comparisons per game Single Pin Spares and Opens for each pin number.Strike PercentageNumber of StrikesStrike ChancesSpare PercentageNumber of SparesSpare ChancesHigh GameHigh SeriesMost Strikes in a RowAverage Ball Stats:Number of Strikes for a ballStrike Chances for a ballStrike Percentage for a ballNumber of Spares, Single Pin Spares, and Multi Pin SparesChances to get Spares, Single Pin Spares, and Multi Pin Spares for a ballPercentage of Spares, Single Pin Spares, and Multi Pin Spares for a ballKnown Bugs:NoneThis is a user driven project and I am taking suggestions of what the users want. Leave a comment here or email me with suggestions or bugs. I want to make this app as good as possible.Updates currently in progress:Game review feature that will give you a look at past games ball by ball. Facebook sharing integration.

reviews.title: Good for scorekeeping.
reviews.comment: I have newest version and it keeps score good for several leagues, but will not show me any stats at all on any stat screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty decent
reviews.comment: Not bad if all you want to track is what each shot was. Would be a 5 if you could track tournaments with more than 3 games. Also I\'m not sure why the tracking of where you stand vs where the ball goes? If that data were accessible,  that would be good. Another feature that would help is ability to remove history or leagues your not in anymore.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app needs to add \"marks\" and arrows to show where you were standing and ball placement also after league night I would like to be able to view stats per ball.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice...
reviews.comment: A must have app for the serious bowler.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Lets me track by league/tournament.  Also like that it tracks by pins.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good bowler stats
reviews.comment: Did not work on my Android Moto Razr- uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User
